properties.query:
OfficeActivity
// Only admin or global-admin can disable/remove policy, but UserType Regular can change Sharing Policy (SharingPolicyChanged)
// | where RecordType =~ "ExchangeAdmin"
| where OfficeWorkload == "SharePoint" or OfficeWorkload == "OneDrive"
| where UserType in~ ("Admin","DcAdmin") // To be changed of UserType Regular Sharing Policy changed should be monitored as well
| where Operation == "SharingPolicyChanged" or Operation == "DeviceAccessPolicyChanged" or Operation == "NetworkAccessPolicyChanged"
| extend changedPolicy_ = tostring(parse_json(ModifiedProperties)[0].Name)
| extend oldPolicyValue_ = tostring(parse_json(ModifiedProperties)[0].OldValue)
| extend newPolicyValue_ = tostring(parse_json(ModifiedProperties)[0].NewValue)
| extend ClientIPOnly = case( 
  ClientIP has ".", tostring(split(ClientIP,":")[0]), 
  ClientIP has "[", tostring(trim_start(@'[[]',tostring(split(ClientIP,"]")[0]))),
  ClientIP
)
| extend Port = case(
  ClientIP has ".", (split(ClientIP,":")[1]),
  ClientIP has "[", tostring(split(ClientIP,"]:")[1]),
  ClientIP
) 
  | summarize StartTimeUtc = min(TimeGenerated), EndTimeUtc = max(TimeGenerated), OperationCount = count() by Operation, UserType, UserId, ClientIP = ClientIPOnly, Port, ResultStatus, Parameters, changedPolicy_, oldPolicyValue_, newPolicyValue_
  | extend timestamp = StartTimeUtc, AccountCustomEntity = UserId, IPCustomEntity = ClientIP
properties.description: Checking OfficeActivities, SharePoint and OneDrive workloads for "SharingPolicyChanged" "DeviceAccessPolicyChanged" "NetworkAccessPolicyChanged" of Administrators
